name: .WL1 File Extension
summary: Learn about .WL1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Various Wolfenstein 3D modding programs allow you to open WL1 files and edit or extract the game data they contain. For example, you can open many WL1 files in SLADE (multiplatform) and Havoc's Wolf3D Editor (Windows).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
